title: FS: RAW 1888 Scrapps (H.D. Smith and Company) – Edward “Ned” Hanlon - Detroits
author: HexsHeroes

posts.post_title: FS: RAW 1888 Scrapps (H.D. Smith and Company) – Edward “Ned” Hanlon - Detroits
posts.post_content:
FS: RAW 1888 Scrapps (H.D. Smith and Company) – Edward “Ned” Hanlon - Detroits

Attractive card.  Decent colors, light stain bleeding through to front, diagonal crease in upper left corner of cap, tip of mustache missing.

Price:  $295 firm, postage paid.  Will be shipped via USPS Priority Mail.


I would prefer payment via Paypal Family & Friends, but would accept check or money order (either which must clear before I ship).

First person to reserve and pay via Paypal buys it.

My thanks.
Vincent

posts.post_title: Sold. Send me your paypal info.

posts.post_content:
TimD:  Paypal info was sent to you via PM last night.

Please PM me once payment has been sent, and include your mailing address,
so that I may begin prep of USPS Priority Mail box to deliver Ned Hanlon Scrapp card to you.

My thanks for interest in my item.  Look forward to receiving your payment  and mailing address information.
